question: Can dead person hear and see his ralatives and other person sitting around him?.
answer:
QUESTION
I have heard that he can hear and see more clearly than person are alive and he also sees angels.
ANSWER


Share:
The condition of a dead person is in the control of Allah Ta'ala. If Allah
wills, the dead will heard and see. If Allah does not will, the dead cannot
hear and see.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
